lead_paragraph: After being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, former Special Forces operative turned mercenary Wade Wilson, adopts the alter ego Deadpool. Armed with his new abilities and a dark, twisted sense of humor, Deadpool hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.
